name: Execute
description: This card deals damage equal to 40% of your opponent's maximum hitpoints if they were reduced to below 30% HP this turn.

immediateEffect.script: double hpPercent = (double)Opponent.CurrentHP / Opponent.MaxHP; if (hpPercent < 0.30) { int damage = (int)(Opponent.MaxHP * 0.40); DealDamage(Opponent, damage); } else { Log("Execute fails - opponent HP too high!"); }
